expected:
usage: cov init [-h] [--git-dir <dir>] [--force] [directory]

positional arguments:
 directory       sets the directory to put the repository in; defaults to current directory

optional arguments:
 -h, --help      shows this help message and exits
 --git-dir <dir> points to connected Git repository; defaults to current repo
 --force         will re-init the repository with a fresh database
